arts.ttl: Inter Milan Sweating Over Experienced Midfield Star After Injury In 3-1 Defeat At Napoli
arts.sum: Inter Milan are awaiting further medical updates on Henrikh Mkhitaryan after the midfielder was forced off early in the 3-1 defeat against Napoli at the Stadio Maradona. The Armenian left the pitch in the 32nd minute, shortly after the penalty incident that led to the opening goal of the match. arts.ttl: Cristian Chivu Admits “We Lost Our Heads” As Inter Milan Collapse To 3-1 Defeat To Napoli
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu admitted that his team lost emotional control at key moments as Napoli ran out 3–1 winners at the Stadio Maradona. arts.ttl: Nerazzurri President Slams “Game-Changing Penalty Decision” As Inter Milan Fall 3-1 To Napoli At The Maradona
arts.sum: Inter CEO Beppe Marotta expressed frustration over the penalty that opened the scoring as Inter Milan lost 3-1 to Napoli, arguing that the decision changed the momentum of the match.
